attributes.name: handle
attributes.description: Handle, or instance number, associated with the structure in SMBIOS

attributes.name: array_handle
attributes.description: The memory array that the device is attached to

attributes.name: form_factor
attributes.description: Implementation form factor for this memory device

attributes.name: total_width
attributes.description: Total width, in bits, of this memory device, including any check or error-correction bits

attributes.name: data_width
attributes.description: Data width, in bits, of this memory device

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Size of memory device in bytes

attributes.name: set
attributes.description: Identifies if memory device is one of a set of devices. A value of 0 indicates no set affiliation.

attributes.name: device_location
attributes.description: String number of the string that identifies the physically-labeled socket or board position where the memory device is located

attributes.name: bank_location
attributes.description: String number of the string that identifies the physically-labeled bank where the memory device is located

attributes.name: memory_type
attributes.description: Type of memory used

attributes.name: memory_type_details
attributes.description: Additional details for memory device

attributes.name: max_speed
attributes.description: Max speed of memory device in megatransfers per second (MT/s)

attributes.name: configured_clock_speed
attributes.description: Configured speed of memory device in megatransfers per second (MT/s)

attributes.name: manufacturer
attributes.description: Manufacturer ID string

attributes.name: serial_number
attributes.description: Serial number of memory device

attributes.name: asset_tag
attributes.description: Manufacturer specific asset tag of memory device

attributes.name: part_number
attributes.description: Manufacturer specific serial number of memory device

attributes.name: min_voltage
attributes.description: Minimum operating voltage of device in millivolts

attributes.name: max_voltage
attributes.description: Maximum operating voltage of device in millivolts

attributes.name: configured_voltage
attributes.description: Configured operating voltage of device in millivolts
